responsibilities: Building and innovating various components of the perception stack, including datasets, modeling, evaluation, applications, and more.
Collaborating with team members to deliver cutting-edge multimodal models.
Bringing the benefits of frontier research in perception to billions of users.
qualifications: Ability to excel in fast-paced environments and deliver results with precision and finesse.
Passion for exploring new technologies and navigating complex and impactful problems.
Experience in designing and conducting experiments and navigating complex results.
Ability to drive innovations in deep learning, image/video perception, neural network architectures, datasets, perception evaluations, and ML systems.
Team player willing to do a variety of tasks to move the team forward.
Ability to execute tasks efficiently and consistently.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on building and innovating components of the perception stack, which includes datasets, modeling, evaluation, and applications. The mention of "multimodal models" suggests working with models that can process and understand multiple types of data, such as images, videos, and text. However, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities.

The skills required include driving innovations in deep learning, image/video perception, neural network architectures, and ML systems. These skills are relevant to machine learning and perception tasks but do not specifically indicate working with Generative AI or language models.

Overall, while the job involves advanced machine learning and perception tasks, there is no direct indication that it involves working with Generative AI or language models.
